title: Would you like to see  a "buy random item" button?
body: Well, as the title asks, would you like to see a "buy random item" button for say, 4g?

replies.body:
The random element is not entirely removed tho, and gold cost would be new, affecting the economy of the game.

I personally think that being able to recreate builds from one game to the next is good and challenging.

I think a Item re-roll would be more reasonable.

For example, have a box near the item island, drag and drop an item you want re-rolled into the box at the cost of 2-4 gold and the box will spit out a randomized item.

While I like the idea of rerolling items, the randomness of them actually brings forth a degree of skill to the game.  Building around what is given to you is a big part of the game and rerolls would remove that so you can use the same build every game no matter what.
Considering that value of items, though, it would have to cost a bit more than 4g.
